 ); } const Beat = ({beat}) => { const { addItem,inCart } = useCart(); const [modalShow, setModalShow] = React.useState(false); const handleSelection = (beat,e) => { if(e.target.id ==="mp3"){ addItem({id:beat.id,name:beat.title,price:80,license:"mp3"}); setModalShow(false); } else if(e.target.id === "wav"){ addItem({id:beat.id,name:beat.title,price:120,license:"wav"}) setModalShow(false) } else if(e.target.id === "premium"){ addItem({id:beat.id,name:beat.title,price:150,license:"premium"}) setModalShow(false) } } const alreadyAdded = inCart(beat.id); return ( <> {beat.title} 02:54 0 {beat.genre} setModalShow(false)} beatItem = {beat} handleselection ={handleSelection} /> ); } export default Beat;
